product.name: Spring-Rolls
product.discription: rolls filled with fresh vegetables and served with sweet chili sauce.

product.name: Bruschetta
product.discription: Grilled bread topped with diced tomatoes, basil, garlic, and olive oil.

product.name: Dumplings
product.discription: Dough pockets filled with meat or vegetables, steamed, boiled, or pan-fried.

product.name: Mapo Tofu
product.discription: Spicy Sichuan dish with soft tofu and minced meat in a rich, flavorful sauce.

product.name: Crispy Duck
product.discription: Roasted duck with crispy skin, often served with a plum or hoisin sauce.

product.name: Tiramisu
product.discription: Layered Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa

product.name: Fortune Cookies
product.discription: Crisp cookies with a small piece of paper inside, containing a fortune or a piece of wisdom.
